user_query: I'm organizing a company retreat and I need to find a suitable location with conference facilities. Can you recommend some hotels with meeting rooms in a peaceful and scenic environment? Also, provide me with team-building activity ideas and nearby restaurants for group dining.

TaskList.description: Search for hotels that offer conference facilities in peaceful and scenic locations.
Compile a list of team-building activity ideas suitable for corporate retreats.
Find nearby restaurants that can accommodate group dining.
